panelChats.customTitle: Switching from Prism.js to Markdown Syntax Highlighting

messages.messageText: Use markdown to syntax highlight code instead of prism
This should show up as a change in stashedState

panelChats.customTitle: Expandable Panel Chats in Commit Details

messages.messageText: Make the panel chats expandable as well
Make it expandable in the same way the commit is expandable, don't have a drop down button
For all commit messages that are not Added Changes or Unadded Changes, add in a Commit Message: before the commit message

panelChats.customTitle: Track Scroll Position and Expanded State in UpdateContent

messages.messageText: Change updateContent, so that it keeps track of your scrolled position, and which things are expanded

panelChats.customTitle: Debugging Context Link Click Issues in Extension

messages.messageText: Right now, nothing happens when the context link is clicked, why?
Nothing is logged when the link is clicked

panelChats.customTitle: Adding File Open Command and Relative Path Display

messages.messageText: add the openFile command mentioned in human_readable onclick. Also, make human_readable show a relative path instead of an absolute path

I am getting Refused to execute inline event handler because it violates the following Content Security Policy directive: "script-src 'nonce-OvuNcaWrdZnX6vCcETCLuwaE13nDCW24' 'self' https://*.vscode-cdn.net". Either the 'unsafe-inline' keyword, a hash ('sha256-...'), or a nonce ('nonce-...') is required to enable inline execution. Note that hashes do not apply to event handlers, style attributes and javascript: navigations unless the 'unsafe-hashes' keyword is present.

also, explain the relative path logic
Get the path relative to the workspace folder instead

panelChats.customTitle: Panel Chat Title and ID Display Update

messages.messageText: Update this so that the Panel Chat title is the main thing that is displayed with it, and its id is displayed as a sub heading
This is an added change that should cause a merge conflict later 2
